welcome_modal.title: Category 1 Level 3
welcome_modal.text: In the third level, the hero gains a new ability - sword attack. He will need this ability to get through various obstacles in the way, such as boxes or barrels.

finish_modal.title: Všetky úlohy boli splnené!
finish_modal.text: You have successfully learned to destroy obstacles with the hero. The next level follows.

introduction_modal.title: The first task assignment
introduction_modal.text: The way to the first stone button is blocked by several boxes. Use an attack block with a movement block to get through them.

success_modal.title: Well done! You've completed your first task!
success_modal.text: Your first algorithm at this level allowed the hero to chop the boxes in the path.

introduction_modal.title: The second task assignment
introduction_modal.text: In this task, the hero is facing barrels instead of pots, but they have no chance against his sword. It is also necessary to use jumping and avoid the trap in front of the stone button.

success_modal.title: Well done! You've completed your second task!
success_modal.text: Your second algorithm allowed the hero to chop the barrels in his way and successfully reach the target.

introduction_modal.title: The third task assignment
introduction_modal.text: And in the third task, hero will face old empty vases to destroy them as well. Let's do this.

success_modal.title: Well done! You've completed your third task!
success_modal.text: It looks like nothing can stop your hero. Keep up the good work.

introduction_modal.title: The fourth task assignment
introduction_modal.text: In the next fourth role of the heroes, the procedure will be more about jumping than cutting with a sword. Can you find the right blocks to bring the hero to the stone button?

success_modal.title: Well done! You've completed your fourth task!
success_modal.text: Great job, the end of the level is already within hero's reach.

introduction_modal.title: The fifth task assignment
introduction_modal.text: There is only one stone button that the hero must reach. In his path is only the last vase and many dangerously spaced traps to watch out for.

success_modal.title: Well done! You have completed your fifth task!
success_modal.text: You have proven that you can handle the sword as well as jumping.
